description: Yes, you can link your Picovico account with your Facebook account. Click on Login with Facebook while logging and enter your Facebook login details to link both the accounts. This way you can log in to Picovico using either Facebook, or your email.
description_text: Yes, you can link your Picovico account with your Facebook account. Click on Login with Facebook while logging and enter your Facebook login details to link both the accounts. This way you can log in to Picovico using either Facebook, or your email.
title: I already have a Picovico Account, can I still login using Facebook account?
